snippet: “Light by the Water” is the latest exhibition from Plein Air Peconic, a group of Long Island painters and photographers affiliated with the nonprofit Peconic Land Trust.
abstract: Light by the Water: Coastal Landscapes of the Sag Harbor Area, on view at the Sag Harbor Whaling and Historical Museum, is the latest exhibition from Plein Air Peconic, a group of Long Island painters and photographers affiliated with the nonprofit Peconic Land Trust (Metropolitan/Long Island).
lead_paragraph: “Light by the Water” is the latest exhibition from Plein Air Peconic, a group of Long Island painters and photographers affiliated with the nonprofit Peconic Land Trust.

headline.seo: ‘Light by the Water,’ by Plein Air Peconic, in Sag Harbor
headline.main: A Symbiotic Relationship of Art and Conservation
headline.print_headline: A Symbiotic Relationship Of Art and Conservation
